College_Summary: National Institute of Technical Teachers Training and Research is situated in Kolkata and was established in 1965. The institute was set up by the Dept. of Education, MHRD, Govt. of India as fully centrally funded autonomous institution with the purpose of providing pre & in-service training to the teachers and staff of Degree and Diploma level training institutions and also for conducting various activities related to quality improvement of the technical education system of the country. NITTTR envisions to be the lead resource institute for promoting excellence in technical education, management education and vocational education & training system. The Govt of India, in 2003, accorded national status to this institute in recognition of the contribution of these institutes for the expert service rendered for overall improvement of quality of Technical Education System. The focal activities of the institute are Education & Short-term Training, Curriculum Development, Learning Resources Development, Research & Development and Extension Services & Consultancy. The Institute also offers three AICTE approved Post Graduate Degree Programmes in Manufacturing Technology, Multimedia & Software Systems, and Mechatronics Engineering, leading to M.Tech Degree of West Bengal University of Technology (WBUT).

College_Summary: Aliah University, Kolkata, formerly known as Mohammedan College of Calcutta, popularly known as Madrasah-i-Aliah or Calcutta Madrasah. The university imparts education in the stream of Arts, Science, and Technology through UG, PG, and Ph.D. programs such as BA, MA, B.Sc, M.Sc, B.Tech, M.Tech, etc. Admission to all the courses is via entrance exam conducted by the university itself. Students applying for B.Tech or M.Tech can also submit WBJEE or GATE exam scores for admission. The application process for admission is in online mode. Graduates from the university are placed in companies such as Amazon, Tech Mahindra, Capgemini, ITC, Berger, HCL, etc.

College_Summary: IIFT Kolkata, established in 2006 is one of the top Business Schools in India, known for its academic excellence in the field of International Business. IIFT has been ranked 27th by NIRF Ranking 2023 in the management category. The institute has collaborations with around 41 Universities/ B-schools around the world to provide a student/ faculty exchange program. The flagship course of IIFT Kolkata is a 2-year MBA (IB) program and the intake for the same is 253.

College_Summary: Ramakrishna Mission Vivekananda University (RKMVU), Coimbatore also known as the FDMSE campus is a member of Ramakrishna Mission (known as Ramakrishna Movement or Vedanta Movement) fraternity founded by Swami Vivekananda. It is located in the Ramakrishna Mission Vidyalaya started in 1930 and its foundation stone was laid by Mahatma Gandhi in one of its temporary campuses. The University holds the status of ‘Deemed to be University and is headquartered at Belur.

College_Summary: Senate of Serampore College was set up in the year 1818 by the pioneer of Christian missionaries. It aims at providing education in sciences and arts to students of every caste, color, or country. The college has attained the status of Deemed to be university by UGC. It is running the academic administration of all its affiliated theological colleges. The university offers undergraduate, post-graduate, diploma and doctoral programs in the field of theological studies.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Peace and Christian Studies

College_Summary: Burdwan University, popularly known as the University of Burdwan is a UGC-approved, state university. Established in 1960, it is the second-largest university in the state of West Bengal. Burdwan University comprises 4 academic campuses and 166 affiliated colleges. Burdwan University campuses are Rajbari, Technology, Golapbag, and Tarabag campus for Medical Education.

Gour Banga University is recognized by the University Grants Commission. Gour Banga University, Malda was founded in 2008. At the undergraduate level, Gour Banga University offers degrees in BA, B.Sc., B.Com, BCA, B.Ed., and LLB. There are 23 postgraduate programmes offered by the university, including MA, M.Sc., M.Com., MLIS, and LLM programmes. Gour Banga University also provides Doctorate programmes across a variety of fields. The selection process for admission to the various programmes is based on merit, which is determined by the qualifying test scores. Entrance to the PG and PhD programmes is determined by an entrance exam, which is followed by an interview. The application is available in both offline and online modes.

Kalyani University, established in 1960, has marked its progression for which students & scholars of the country join the region of this pedagogical center. The university is bifurcated and the faculty of agriculture evolved as Bidhan Chandra Krishi Viswavidyalaya. The university has been accredited ‘Grade A’ by NAAC and approved by UGC. The highly qualified Kalyani University Faculty members have bagged 151 rank in the Overall category by NIRF, 2022. This state university sprawls over around 360 acres. The university has a total number of 64 affiliated colleges. Check: Kalyani University Affiliated Colleges

College_Summary: Vidyasagar University is a well recognised and prominent institute in West Bengal offering undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral courses with multiple specializations. The admission to the UG and PG courses are provided either on the basis of merit scores achieved in class 10 +2 or VUMAT entrance exam scores. Besides this the university & its affiliated colleges also accept the scores of CAT/ MAT and NET/SET/ UGC(JRF) for admission in MBA and Ph.D. programs respectively. The college also offers courses in distance education mode.

Visva Bharati University is a UGC-approved Central university accredited by NAAC with an ‘A’ grade. Established in 1921 by Rabindranath Tagore, Visva Bharati University is located in Bolpur Sriniketan, West Bengal. The university campus sprawls to 1128.89 acres of land with 8 institutes. It is also equipped with Disability Support, Computing and Learning, Transport, a Placement Cell, a Sports Board, a Cafeteria, a Hospital, a Guest House, etc.

West Bengal State University (WBSU) is a state university located in Barasat offering various educational programs at the Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Doctoral levels in the field of Arts, Science, Commerce, Education, Business Administration, Physical Education, etc. WBSU Admission is based on merit scored in the entrance exam conducted by the university. Applicants may fill the online application form by paying the required application fee and submitting the relevant documents. The university also has a distance learning center offering MA in Bengali, Education, English, and History.

West Bengal University of Health Sciences (WBUHS) is the top health university which was established on 1st January 2003 under “West Bengal University of Health Sciences Act XVIII of 2002”. The university is recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC) and affiliated with the Association of Indian University. WBUHS offers UG and PG courses in Orthodontics, Physiotherapy, Nursing, and Dentistry. Diploma courses in Counselling Psychology, Radiography Diagnostic, Child Health, Gynaecology Obstetrics and others.

Falakata Polytechnic, West Bengal was established in 2001 and is ranked 1st in Diploma Engineering College in Jalpaiguri by government bodies. The college offers diploma courses in five branches of engineering. Additionally, the college administration also offers diploma courses in Food Processing Technology. Admissions are offered strictly based on entrance exams like JEXPO/ VOCLET followed by counseling procedures.

Vijay Garh Jyotish Ray College is located in Jadavgarh district of Kolkata, West Bengal. Started in 1950, this institute aims at academic excellence and knowledge to broaden the perspective of the students.

Dum Dum Motijheel College, Kolkata was incepted with the vision to provide with quality education to the students coming from various regions and states of the country. Emphasis is laid on inculcating moral, intellectual and ethical values in the students. The college has a decent infrastructure and state of the art facilities, enwrapped with modern amenities. The college aims to nurture the students to be academically competent and good human. It is located in a sprawling campus providing the perfect ambience for a successful career graph and imparting education.

Sidho Kanho Birsha University Purulia was established in 2010 by the Government of West Bengal. It delivers excellent quality of education in a range of subjects such as physics, chemistry, mathematics, computer science, English, history, sociology, zoology, and other academic subjects. It offers courses at UG, PG, PhD, Diploma, and Certificate levels. Admissions to all the courses except PhD are provided on merit in the qualifying examination.

The college offers undergraduate pass and honors courses in Science, Arts, and Commerce. The aim of this college is to promote talented students by delivering quality education at the undergraduate level. It has excellent infrastructural facilities to provide a positive learning environment.

College_Summary: Eastern Institute for Integrated Learning in Management (EIILM), Kolkata is awarded the ‘Education Excellence Award’ for Best Placement by Zee 24 Ghanta. EIILM Kolkata offers MBA, BBA, B.Sc and PhD Courses in the discipline of Management, Business Analytics, Hospital Management and many more. Foreign language courses like French and Germany are also taught to the students.  Admission to EIILM Kolkata is done on the basis of entrance test scores followed by GD & PI. The Institute has enjoyed an outstanding 100% placement record in top companies since its inception. EIILM offers summer internships and winter internships in renowned organizations. 3 Students of EIILM Mumbai got placed in BYJU’s Learning App with INR 10 LPA. EIILM provides the best placement training and summer and winter internships for students. The highest salary was offered at INR 12 LPA.

College_Summary: The Institute of Leadership, Entrepreneurship, and Development (iLEAD) Kolkata is one of the most well-known college for media, management, design, technical and professional studies in the country. Affiliated by Maulana Abdul Kalam Azad University of Technology, West Bengal. The institute has a total strength of 2,300+ including male and female students, as well as a strong faculty of 75+ highly accomplished and experienced teachers. iLEAD currently has collaborations with more than 16 international universities including the Colvin Institute of Real Estate Development, USA.

Berhampore College initially established as Raja Krishnath College of Commerce is an Arts & Science college offering courses such as BA, B.Com, and B.Sc (both Hons. and General). Admission to all the courses is merit-based and the application process for the same is online. The interested applicants are required to apply online through the official website. Berhampore College also provides hostel accommodation to students with all the facilities required for a healthy living.

Burdwan Medical College (BMC), West Bengal was established in the year 1969. The college is recognized by MCI and is affiliated to the West Bengal University of Health Science. The aim of this college is to produce excellent doctors by imparting knowledge and skills in the field of medical science. Presently, the college offers the MBBS program at UG level and MD, MS program at PG level.

College_Summary: City College Kolkata is an Arts and Science college offering 6 Undergraduate courses to students. The courses offered by the college include BA, B.Com, and B.Sc (both General & Hons.), admission to which is merit-based. Applicants with 50% aggregate marks in the previous qualifying exam are eligible for admission. To apply for admission, the candidate may either follow the online process or he/ she may also go with the offline process.

The students must apply for admission through the official website by filling up the application form and paying the relevant fee of INR 400.

Jangipur College is a government sponsored institute situated in West Bengal and is featured among Top Colleges in Murshidabad. The college is known for its undergraduate courses in Arts, Science and Commerce stream. The admissions to these courses are based on the candidate's merit in the last qualifying examinations. The institute does not conduct any separate entrance test for admissions to the courses. Know More: Jangipur College, Murshidabad Courses & Fees

Students who are interested in admission are required to apply online through the official website.

Under Post-Graduation, the institute offers M.A. degree in 2 specializations. The institute also provides a one year certificate course (UGC sponsored) on Microfinance Management..

College_Summary: Islampur College is a college of higher education established in 1973 at Siliguri, West Bengal. It is affiliated to the University of North Bengal, Darjeeling. The college offers general and honors undergraduate courses in the field of Arts, Science & Commerce. Admission is done on the basis of merit. The college provides financial assistance to its students by offering free studentships.

College_Summary: Krishnagar Government College is an autonomous and government owned college. The mathematics department of Krishnagar Government College has been honoured with ‘Shiksha Ratna’ by the honourable Chief Minister of West Bengal. It offers various UG as well as the PG courses in the discipline of Arts and Science.

Krishnath College offers various UG and PG level courses with multiple specializations along with various certification courses. The college offers BA, BA (Hons). B.Sc and B.Sc (Hons) at UG level. At PG level, KNC offers MA and M. Sc courses. Admission to all these courses are done through counselling conducted by the college itself based on the merit in qualifying exam

The admission in all the courses is purely based on merits scored by individuals in the examination and application forms can be filled only via online mode.

The hospital provides facilities like preventive, diagnostic and curative services to the people of districts Murshidabad, Birbhum and the northern part of Nadia. The college has a huge campus with 32 acres of area. This college is affiliated to the West Bengal University of Health Sciences and recognized by Medical Council of India (MCI) . The college is also affiliated by State Medical Faculty of West Bengal (SMFWB).

College of Medicine and JNM Hospital, also called Kalyani Medical College is a government hospital that was founded in 2009. It is affiliated to the West Bengal University of Health Sciences (WBUHS), which is ranked 11th in Kolkata.

College of Medicine and Sagore Dutta Hospital, commonly known as CMSDH, was founded in 2010 in Kolkata. The college is affiliated with the West Bengal University of Health Sciences (WBUHS) and was approved by the Medical Council of India in 2011. CMSDH offers UG and PG courses in medical, nursing, and paramedical fields.

BCDA College of Pharmacy & Technology (BCDAPT) was established in 2006 by BCDA Members Benevolent Trust. It is one of the oldest organizations in the trade of medicines with more than 32,000 members all over Kolkata. The college is situated inside the modern city of Kolkata at 78 Jessore Road, Hridaypur, Barasat city and is affiliated to Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology (MAKAUT), Kolkata.

College_Summary: Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Institute of Pharmacy, Nadia West Bengal was established in 2004. It offers 1 undergraduate course i.e B.Pharm and one postgraduate course i.e M.Pharm which is available in 3 disciplines. The admission is based on both merit and entrance exam namely WBJEE. The application mode is both online and offline.

Cooch Behar Panchanan Barma University is one of the top state Universities in Cooch Behar district, West Bengal established in 2012. The University is approved by UGC. The University offers UG, PG, Ph.D., and M.Phil. programmes. It also offers B.Voc. degree programs and certificate courses. A total number of 15 colleges are affiliated to the university. Admission takes place on the basis of Merit-based and Entrance-based depending upon the opted course. Research Eligibility Test (RET) is conducted towards the admission of Ph.D.

It is a government college managed by the Government of West Bengal in Malda. It also has a permit from the Medical Council of India to run the said medical courses for aspiring students. The medical college imparts education for students for the Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) course and PG courses. Nearly 4600 students have taken education from Malda Medical College. Admissions are done on the basis of entrance examinations conducted by the WBUHS.

College_Name: College of Medicine and Sagore Dutta Hospital (CMSDH), Kolkata
College_Summary: Bankura university was established in 2014. The university has 25 constituent colleges and 9 departments in the field of language, literature, cultural studies, and different branches of science. It offers postgraduate programs such as MA, MSW, LLM, and MSc and Ph.D. programs. Basic admission criteria for any particular course is decided on the basis of merit. The application forms are available online.

College_Summary: West Bengal University of Teachers' Training Education Planning and Administration (WBUTTEPA), Kolkata is a state-level university that was established in the year 2015. The university offers B.Ed., M.Ed., Ph.D. and M.Phil programs in various disciplines at Undergraduate and Postgraduate levels. Admission is done on the basis of the entrance exam followed by counseling at the university level. Applicants are required to apply online through the official website for admission. Application fee for the same varies from course to course.

College_Summary: Directorate of Distance Education, Vidyasagar University offers Masters level education in Arts, Science and Commerce streams. All India Institute of Hygiene and Public Health is the first school dedicated to Public Health in the South-East Asia Region, focusing on providing education, training, and extensive research in various disciplines of public health and related areas. The college was established in the year 1932 and is affiliated with the West Bengal University of Health Sciences (WBUHS). The institute is approved by the Medical Council of India (MCI). All India Institute of Hygiene and Public Health offers educational courses in diverse fields, including public health, dietetics, epidemiology, applied nutrition, and veterinary public health. It had been a WHO collaborating Center for Disaster Management.

Post Graduate Diploma in Public Health

College_Summary: Chandrapur College was established in the year 1985 at Burdwan District, West Bengal. It is a Government-aided college affiliated with the University of Burdwan. The institution is accredited with NAAC grade B.

Jogamaya Devi College, one of the oldest women’s colleges in Eastern India, was founded in 1932 by Dr. Shyamaprasad Mukgerjee to fight the scarcity of education centers for women in Kolkata. It has received the prestigious status of “Centre of Excellence in Women’s Education”. The college is affiliated with the University of Calcutta and it is also accredited grade ‘B’ college by the NAAC. It offers UG courses with both general and honors subjects, it also offers PG courses in Bengali and Botany. The college is also approved by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and it also receives fundings from the Government of India through the Rashtriya Uchchatar Shiksha Abhiyan (RUSA).

Kalipada Ghosh Tarai Mahavidyalaya, recognised by UGC under 2F and 12B was established in November 1988 for spreading higher education among the underprivileged and rural people of the surrounding area as an undergraduate College.

College_Name: Directorate of Distance Education, Vidyasagar University, Midnapore
College_Summary: Naba Ballygunge Mahavidyalaya, formerly known as Charuchandra Evening College, was established in 1985. The college offers UG and PG programs in the streams of Arts and Commerce. The courses offered are BA, BA (Hons.), B.Com (Hons.), B.Com, MA, and M.Com. Admission to the college is merit-based, the applicants must obtain 50% aggregate marks in the previous qualifying examination to be eligible for the admission. The application process for the same is online. The students may apply through the official website.

College_Name: All India Institute of Hygiene and Public Health
College_Summary: Rabindra Bharati University was established in 1962 with its Directorate of Distance Education being established in the year 2002 to provide higher education to those who cannot commit to the normal university patterns. RBU has been accredited and reaccredited with a Grade A by NAAC. Under the guidance of a university with nearly 50 years of history, the RBU DDE has been providing excellent education to its students for nearly 2 decades.

Sarojini Naidu College for Women (SNCW) is situated in the northern suburb parts of Kolkata. It is considered one of the first institutions for women’s education in this part which was established on 14th August 1956. Now the college is officially under the affiliation of West Bengal State University (WBSU). SNCW Kolkata is a Government-sponsored college, approved by the University Grants Commission (UGC). The college also provides postgraduate courses. Admission to the course is done on the basis of merit scored in the previous qualifying examinations.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Summary: ​Midnapore College is an autonomous college, established in the year 1873. It is the oldest college in Midnapore affiliated with Vidyasagar University. It has been given autonomous status by University Grants Commission (UGC). The college runs various courses at undergraduate and postgraduate level in multiple disciplines. It also offers Diploma and PG Diploma programs.

Maharani Kasiswari College was established in 1964, the college is located in Kolkata. It is a girls’ college which is affiliated with the University of Calcutta. The college offers B.A., B.Sc, and B.Com degrees with both Honours and General courses. The college is also accredited by the NAAC. The institute also offers some basic certification programs like Computer literacy & training program, Communicative English program and Computer certification course.

Netaji Mahavidyalaya, also known as Kalipur College, is one of the oldest colleges in Arambagh, in the Hooghly district, West Bengal. The college offers 21 under-graduate courses in Arts, Commerce and Sciences and one post-graduate course. Admission to all these courses is strictly on the basis of merit of the qualifying examinations. Candidates shall fill the application form online through the official website.

College_Name: Directorate of Distance Education Rabindra Bharati University, Kolkata
College_Summary: Umes Chandra College (UCC Calcutta) located at Kolkata West Bengal was established in 1961. It is affiliated to the University of Calcutta and accredited by NAAC at ‘B’ level. The college is recognized by UGC & MHRD. UCC Kolkata offers only B.Com and B.Com (Hons.) to its students. Admission to this college is purely based on merit.

College_Name: Sarojini Naidu College for Women-[SNCW], Kolkata
College_Summary: Netaji Subhas Mahavidyalaya (NSM), Haldibari, Cooch Behar is a premier academic institute established in the year 1985. It is affiliated to the Cooch Behar Panchanan Barma University. It has been accredited by NAAC with B+ grade in 2016. NSM Cooch Behar offers B.A, B.Sc., B.Com courses at the undergraduate level and M.A. in Bengali at the postgraduate level. The college has good infrastructure to provide its students with learner-friendly facilities.

Established in 1963, New Alipore College, Kolkata, West Bengal is a Government-sponsored college. The college offers BA (Hons), B.Com (Hons) and B.Sc (Hons), BA, B.Com, B.Sc programs at the Under-Graduate level. Admission to all these UG courses is granted based on Merit in the Class 12 examination. Candidates can apply to these courses by filling the online application form from the official website of the college and submit it offline to the college.

Maynaguri College, located in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal is an Arts and Science college offering 4 Undergraduate courses namely, BA (Hons. & Pass) and B.Sc (Hons. & Pass). Admission to the courses is based on merits obtained by the student in the previous qualifying examination. Students may apply online or offline for admission. However, the final selection of the students is made only after all the documents are verified by the institute.

Shayampur Siddheswari Mahavidyalaya, established in 1964, is located in Shyampur village of Howrah district, West Bengal. The college is affiliated to the University of Calcutta and accredited by NAAC at the B level. The college offers undergraduate programs in the field of Arts, Science & Commerce and also offers a post-graduate distance education program under Vidyasagar University.

College_Name: Netaji Subhas Mahavidyalaya - [NSM] Haldibari, Cooch Behar
College_Summary: Rama Krishna Sarada Mission Vivekananda Vidyabhavan is a very recognised college which was founded on the principle of Swami Vivekananda in the year 1961. The admission here is entrance-based which takes the VOCLET score/ ranking secured into consideration.
